comments.comment:
verse 3 (optional, we version)
[above are Song Tags with notes imported from EasyWorship]

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
I will praise Thee; I will praise Thee
In the midst of the congregation.
I will declare Thy name Unto my brethren
For the kingdom is the Lord's:
He is the governor among The nations.
In the midst of the congregation
Will I praise Thee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glorify Him; Glorify Him
All ye the seed of Jacob.
And fear Him and fear Him,
All ye the seed of Israel.
For the kingdom is the Lord's:
He is the governor among the nations.
All ye the seed of Jacob
Now glorify Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We will praise Thee; We will praise Thee
In the midst of the congregation.
We will declare Thy name Unto our brethren
For the kingdom is the Lord's:
He is the governor among The nations.
In the midst of the congregation
Will We praise Thee.
